title: Desktop/laptop ownership among U.S. adults 2008 to 2019
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Share of U.S. adults in each Month on the y axis.
Month November 2016 has the highest Share of U.S. adults and January 2018 has the lowest Share of U.S. adults.
There is a difference of 5.0 between the maximum Month November 2016 and minimum Month January 2018.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of U.S. adults for 9 number of Months.
The Share of U.S. adults is appeared to be the highest at Month November 2016 and lowest at Month January 2018.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Share of U.S. adults in each Month on the y axis.
Month November 2016 has the highest Share of U.S. adults and January 2018 has the lowest Share of U.S. adults.
There is a difference of 5.0 between the maximum Month November 2016 and minimum Month January 2018.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Share of U.S. adults in the y axis.
The Share of U.S. adults is appeared to be the highest at Month November 2016 and lowest at Month January 2018.
There is a difference of 5.0 between the maximum Month November 2016 and minimum Month January 2018.
Share of U.S. adults at Month November 2016 is 78.0 , second place is June 2010 at 78.0, and thirdly is June 2010 at 78.0.
Overall Share of U.S. adults has remained unvaried over the Months.
Month February 2019, April 2016, and January 2008 share the same value 74.0.
The lowest value 73.0 at January 2018 is almost 1.04 times smaller than the average value 75.22.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 677.0.
